CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 12, 1958, pg. 28 reads: "Infant Baptism - The glory of Easter included the baptism of infants, the ritual by which parents dedicate their children to Christ. Among the 18 bundles of life blessed and Baptized by the Rev. Charles H. Foggie at Wesley Center AME Zion CHurch Sunday was Baby Brenda Glenn (in minister's arms), daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Walter Glenn, 437 Burrows St."
TitMainTitle: Rev. Charles Foggie standing at microphone holding book, with men, women, children, and babies, gathered at altar railing in church with flowers, for baptism at Wesley Center A.M.E. Zion Church, seen from above
CatSubject_tab: Foggie, Charles H.
